Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, south of the Evenborough Park.
Room.LongDescription: The beautiful park on the north side of the road is used by many citizens and tourists alike to meet people, picnic, or just rest after a long day at work. On the south side of the road, you can see the Delgado Family Winery, a small family operation which produces some of the best wines in the land.
